programme.title: Aankhen
programme.desc: When Vijay Singh Rajput is unceremoniously stripped of his duties as a bank manager, he decides to seek revenge by robbing the bank. To make the robbery untraceable, he trains three blind men to do the job for him.

programme.title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
programme.desc: Sameer, a hot-tempered guy relocates to Goa, where he falls in love with Rani. However, his new roommate Sunny puts a spoke in the wheel upon his arrival and Rani finds herself in a dilemma as she starts liking both Sameer and Sunny.

programme.title: Phamous
programme.desc: Passionate men in search of love lust and justice get caught in an endless game of revenge and rivalry leading their city of Chambal into a bullet-riddled mayhem.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Encounter: The Killing
programme.desc: After accidentally shooting a young mobster, a guilt-stricken police officer sets off to search for the parents who never came forward to claim their son's body.

programme.title: Ek Rishtaa - The Bond of Loveâ€¦
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman and his son Ajay quarrel over Ajay's ways of handling the family business and have an ugly fall out. Despite the fall out, Ajay jumps in to help when he realises that a family member is bent on bringing down his father's empire.

programme.title: Jaanwar
programme.desc: A perilous criminal Sultan raises an orphan, who also grows up to become a criminal, known as Badshah. Badshah changes his ways after he falls in love with a street performer Sapna, but Sultan returns to remind Sultan of his past.

programme.title: Deewaar: Let's Bring Our Heroes Home
programme.desc: A group of Indian POW (Prisoners of War) from the 1971 Indo-Pak war rebels against the Pakistani army and tries to escape from their captivity. Helping the group in the mission is Gaurav, the son of a former Army Major also held captive by the enemy.

programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: Four slack and vagabond conmen learn about a hidden treasure from a dying thief and race against time to claim it. Meanwhile, they are also being pursued by a determined police inspector who is hell-bent on finding the treasure and keeping it all to himself.
